transArray.content:
The overall design of the hotel is very good, but the room is too small, it is really not a high-end hotel.
The great location and the low price in the off-season are the biggest advantages, and the service of member benefits can be exchanged for free breakfast is also a plus.
The disadvantage is that the bedside spherical lamp cannot be turned on, and there is an unknown bracket beside the bed that is broken.
